name: Loans and extensions of credit to executive officers, directors, principal shareholders and affiliates
text: §412:7-304  Loans and extensions of credit to executive officers, directors, principal shareholders and affiliates.  No savings and loan association shall make any loan or extension of credit in violation of section 11 of the Home Owners' Loan Act of 1933, as amended, 12 U.S.C. §1468. [L 1993, c 350, pt of §1]
